description: This function calculates the bulk modulus of a material, which is a measure of the material's resistance to compressibility under uniform pressure. It is defined as the pressure increase needed to cause a given relative decrease in volume.
code:
def compute_bulk_modulus(pressure, initial_volume, final_volume):
    volume_change = initial_volume - final_volume
    relative_volume_change = volume_change / initial_volume
    bulk_modulus = pressure / relative_volume_change
    return bulk_modulus
